General.Name: Entheon Biomedical Corp
General.Description: Entheon Biomedical Corp. operates as a biotechnology research and development company. It engages in developing of products for treating addiction and substance use disorders. Entheon Biomedical Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 999 West Broadway, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V5Z 1K5
